title: Drawing, "The Salon in the Montpensier Wing, Palais Royal", ca. 1831
medium: Brush and watercolor, white gouache over graphite on white wove paper
provenance: Eugene V. Thaw Collection; Galerie Jacques Fischer, Paris
dimensions:
Frame H x W x D: 50.2 x 39.7 x 2.5 cm (19 3/4 in. x 15 5/8 in. x 1 in.)
Sheet: 18.2 x 24.4 cm (7 3/16 x 9 5/8 in.)
description: This view of the Montpensier Wing of the Palais Royal in Paris shows an elegant room with three French doors leading to a courtyard. Sienna-colored tieback curtains coordinate with the tones of the upholstered Empire style furniture. Console tables on either side of the room are placed in front of tall mirrors which reflect gilt-bronze candelabra. Blue painted medallions in the Empire style decorate the upper border of the salon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Salon in the Montpensier Wing, Palais Royal", ca. 1831.
ca. 1831. Brush and watercolor, white gouache over graphite on white wove paper. Thaw Collection. 2007-27-10.
